list.title: DiscordRateLimit#consume
list.description: Consumes a token for the requested channel before proceeding.

list.title: DiscordRateLimit#getBucket
list.description: Retrieves or creates the bucket assigned to a channel.

list.title: TokenBucket#consume
list.description: Reserves a token before executing the next queued task.

list.title: TokenBucket#drain
list.description: Attempts to release queued tasks while tokens are available.

list.title: TokenBucket#refill
list.description: Refills the bucket according to the elapsed time since the last refill.

list.title: TokenBucket#schedule
list.description: Schedules the next drain attempt when tokens are expected to be available.

list.title: addAssetToWatch
list.description: Adds an asset to a user's watchlist if it is not already present.

list.title: adx
list.description: Computes the Average Directional Index (ADX) from high, low and close series.

list.title: atr14
list.description: Calculates the Average True Range (ATR) using an EMA smoothing.

list.title: bollWidth
list.description: Computes the relative width of Bollinger Bands.

list.title: bollinger
list.description: Calculates Bollinger Bands for the provided closing prices.

list.title: build45mCandles
list.description: Aggregates 15 minute candles into 45 minute candles.

list.title: buildAlerts
list.description: Executes all registered alert modules and returns normalized alert objects.

list.title: buildHash
list.description: Generates a stable SHA-256 hash for alert content.

list.title: buildSnapshotForReport
list.description: Builds KPI snapshots combining multiple indicators for reporting.

list.title: buildSummary
list.description: Generates a Markdown summary from multi-timeframe KPI snapshots.

list.title: buildSummaryPdf
list.description: Renders a Markdown summary into a PDF document using Puppeteer.

list.title: calcConcurrency
list.description: Determines the maximum number of concurrent tasks the bot should run.

list.title: callOpenRouter
list.description: Requests a chat completion from OpenRouter using the configured model.

list.title: cci
list.description: Calculates the Commodity Channel Index (CCI) for the given prices.

list.title: clampSentiment
list.description: Restricts a sentiment score to the valid range.

list.title: classifySentimentsLocal
list.description: Estimates sentiment locally using a lightweight heuristic model.

list.title: compileMonthlyPerformanceReport
list.description: Builds and dispatches the monthly performance report based on weekly snapshots.

list.title: computeWeightedSentiment
list.description: Computes a time-decayed sentiment average for a list of news items.

list.title: createContext
list.description: Constructs a structured logging context ensuring a request identifier is present.

list.title: crossDown
list.description: Checks whether series A crossed below series B between the last two samples.

list.title: crossUp
list.description: Checks whether series A crossed above series B between the last two samples.

list.title: ema
list.description: Calculates the exponential moving average of a numeric series.

list.title: fetchWithRetry
list.description: Executes an asynchronous function with exponential backoff retries.

list.title: filterFreshNewsItems
list.description: Filters out news items that were recently processed.

list.title: fmt
list.description: Formats a number using the default locale.

list.title: formatAlertMessage
list.description: Formats an alert for presentation on Discord.

list.title: generateWeeklySnapshot
list.description: Aggregates weekly performance data for all assets and persists a snapshot.

list.title: getAlertHash
list.description: Retrieves the last alert hash for a scope/key pair.

list.title: getAssetNews
list.description: Retrieves curated news articles and sentiment analytics for a specific asset.

list.title: getSetting
list.description: Retrieves a single setting value with an optional fallback.

list.title: getSettings
list.description: Returns the in-memory settings object, loading it if necessary.

list.title: getSignature
list.description: Retrieves the stored signature for an asset/timeframe combination.

list.title: getWatchlist
list.description: Retrieves the watchlist for a given user or the aggregated watchlist.

list.title: handleAnalysisSlashCommand
list.description: Generates an analysis summary when requested by the Discord slash command.

list.title: handleInteraction
list.description: Handles Discord slash command interactions for charts, watchlists and analysis.

list.title: initBot
list.description: Initializes the Discord bot client and registers optional command handlers.

list.title: isBBSqueeze
list.description: Determines whether the current Bollinger Band width is in squeeze conditions.

list.title: keltnerChannel
list.description: Calculates Keltner Channels for the provided price series.

list.title: limit
list.description: Shared rate limiter instance configured from the current application settings.

list.title: loadSettings
list.description: Loads persisted settings merging them with the provided defaults.

list.title: loadWeeklySnapshots
list.description: Loads stored weekly snapshot entries sorted by generation time.

list.title: macd
list.description: Calculates the Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) indicator.

list.title: markNewsItemsAsSeen
list.description: Records news items in the cache so they are not processed again within the TTL.

list.title: module.exports
list.description: Creates a limiter that runs asynchronous functions with restricted concurrency.

list.title: monthKeyFromIso
list.description: Parses an ISO string and converts it into a month key in the specified timezone.

list.title: normalizeSentiment
list.description: Normalizes sentiment values from multiple provider formats to the [-1, 1] range.

list.title: notifyOps
list.description: Sends an operational alert to the configured webhook, when available.

list.title: num
list.description: Formats a numeric value with a fixed precision.

list.title: obv
list.description: Computes the On Balance Volume (OBV) cumulative indicator.

list.title: parabolicSAR
list.description: Computes the Parabolic SAR trend indicator for OHLC candles.

list.title: pct
list.description: Formats a decimal value as a percentage string.

list.title: postAnalysis
list.description: Sends a technical analysis report to the configured Discord webhook.

list.title: postCharts
list.description: Uploads chart image files to the configured Discord channel.

list.title: postMonthlyReport
list.description: Posts the monthly performance summary to Discord, optionally attaching a chart.

list.title: previousMonthKey
list.description: Computes the month key for the month prior to the provided date.

list.title: pruneOlderThan
list.description: Removes cached alerts older than the provided time window.

list.title: recordPerf
list.description: Records a performance metric sample for later aggregation.

list.title: removeAssetFromWatch
list.description: Removes an asset from a user's watchlist.

list.title: renderChartPNG
list.description: Renders a candlestick chart PNG for the provided asset and timeframe.

list.title: renderMonthlyPerformanceChart
list.description: Generates a monthly performance bar chart and saves it to disk.

list.title: reportWeeklyPerf
list.description: Summarizes and resets the collected performance metrics.

list.title: resetAlertHashes
list.description: Clears cached alert hashes for a specific scope or all scopes.

list.title: resetSettings
list.description: Clears all stored settings and removes the persisted file.

list.title: roundThreshold
list.description: Determines a rounding threshold based on the magnitude of the price.

list.title: rsi
list.description: Computes the relative strength index (RSI) for a series of closing prices.

list.title: runAgent
list.description: Builds a multi-asset analysis report using market data, news and AI summarization.

list.title: runAll
list.description: Executes the processing pipeline for all configured assets respecting concurrency limits.

list.title: runDailyAnalysis
list.description: Generates and posts the macro daily analysis report when new data is available.

list.title: runOnceForAsset
list.description: Performs the full analysis, alerting and chart generation pipeline for an asset.

list.title: saveStore
list.description: Persists the current store state to disk.

list.title: saveWeeklySnapshot
list.description: Persists a weekly snapshot entry, replacing any existing entry for the same signature.

list.title: scheduleRun
list.description: Queues a background run for the given asset if one is not already in progress.

list.title: scoreHeuristic
list.description: Aggregates several indicators into a heuristic score.

list.title: searchWeb
list.description: Retrieves recent web snippets and official blog updates for an asset.

list.title: semaforo
list.description: Maps a heuristic score into a traffic light emoji.

list.title: sendDiscordAlert
list.description: Dispatches an alert message to Discord honouring webhook rate limits.

list.title: setSetting
list.description: Updates or removes a setting and persists the change.

list.title: shouldSend
list.description: Determines whether a new alert should be sent or suppressed due to duplication.

list.title: sma
list.description: Calculates the simple moving average for the provided series.

list.title: sparkline
list.description: Generates a unicode sparkline from the provided values.

list.title: stochastic
list.description: Calculates the stochastic oscillator for the given price series.

list.title: streamKlines
list.description: Start a Binance kline WebSocket stream for multiple symbol/interval pairs.

list.title: tfToInterval
list.description: Converts an internal timeframe label into a Binance interval string.

list.title: toMonthKey
list.description: Converts a date into a YYYY-MM month key within the provided timezone.

list.title: trendFromMAs
list.description: Estimates trend direction from moving averages.

list.title: updateAlertHash
list.description: Stores or clears an alert hash for deduplication.

list.title: updateSignature
list.description: Updates the signature associated with a key.

list.title: volumeDivergence
list.description: Detects bullish or bearish volume divergence against the price series.

list.title: vwap
list.description: Computes the Volume Weighted Average Price (VWAP).

list.title: williamsR
list.description: Computes the Williams %R oscillator for the given prices.

list.title: withContext
list.description: Derives a child logger bound to the provided context.
